verses.roman:
gauḍa ha-ite sarva vaiṣṇavera āgamana
kulīna-grāma-vāsi-saṅge prathama milana

synonyms: gauḍa ha-ite—from Bengal; sarva—all; vaiṣṇavera—of the Vaiṣṇavas; āgamana—appearance; kulīna-grāma-vāsi—the residents of Kulīna-grāma; saṅge—with them; prathama—first; milana—meeting.
translation: All the devotees from Bengal gradually began arriving at Jagannātha Purī. At this time, the residents of Kulīna-grāma also came to see Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu for the first time.
